1.0.name: wordpress/convert-address-to-google-maps-link
1.0.description:
This simple plugin converts addresses in "<address></address>" tags into links that open a Google Map in a new window.

NOTE: You need to put the address inside the <address></address> html tag for this plugin to work. For example, you would need to write the following into your code: <address>112 1/2 Beacon Street, Boston 02108</address>

FYI: This plugin is great for themes with custom fields that supply the address, but is probably not too useful for themes that don't. Thanks!

Finally, many many thanks to Mike Jasper , who wrote the javascript that powers this plugin. I merely repackaged his code.
